table.name: vtiger_hotels
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hotels` ( `hotelsid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `stars` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `street` varchar(190) DEFAULT '', `coordx` varchar(190) DEFAULT '', `coordy` varchar(190) DEFAULT '', `services` text, `hotelsno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`hotelsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_hotelscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hotelscf` ( `hotelsid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`hotelsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
